誇撚張
剩display card 都過75000
一半
上 intel x299 / amd x399
sli 4張已成往事
CPU 用 i9-9980XE，其他組件等其他巴打出招

一定唔得啦

唔洗買mon咩
四個mon 2×titanx 12gb 就差唔多

一係加多啲

quote.msg: CPU 用 i9-9980XE，其他組件等其他巴打出招

replies.msg: 新手無知一問，一張 GPU 要8-16 個 thread, i9-9980XE 得16條邊夠分？

照足你要求 都要8萬 仲要未買MON
CPU
1X Intel - Core i9-9980XE 3 GHz 18-Core Processor
Cooler
1X Corsair - H100i v2 70.69 CFM Liquid CPU Cooler
Motherboard
1X Asus - PRIME X299-DELUXE ATX LGA2066 Motherboard
RAM

SSD

HDD

2X Seagate - Barracuda 3 TB 3.5" 7200RPM Internal Hard Drive
Display Card
2X NVIDIA - TITAN RTX 24 GB Video Card (2-Way SLI)
Case
1X Corsair - 760T White V2 ATX Full Tower Case
PSU

Case Fan
2X Corsair - SP140 49.49 CFM 140mm Fans
Fan controller
1X Thermaltake - Commander FT Fan Controller

Total: ~HKD 78000 - 80000

點先得到4個x16 唔識

replies.msg: 要machine learning 10萬都唔夠喎 入門應該得

呢度未計機箱 77000-78000 左右
CPU : Intel 7900x
MB : ASUS WS X299 SAGE
RAM : ADATA 16GB DDR4 2666 CL19
VGA : 4張 ASUS TURBO RTX2080TI 11G GDDR6
SSD : SAMSUNG 970 EVO PLUS 1T M.2 SSD
HDD : TOSHIBA ENTERPRISE MG05ACA800E HDD 8TB SATA3 128MB
PSU : Corsair AX1600I DIGITAL ATX POWER SUPPLY 80 PLUS
機箱要搵隻 8 - 9 Slot 嘅
唔太肯定1600W 夠唔夠，睇review 一張2080TI 大約300W
